bug.author: LinuxDevSecOps
bug.description:
Hello I have successfully installed kuberflow. But I am not able to install Kuberflow GUI.. Getting error.. attached with SS <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/48767068/63106642-17201b80-bfa5-11e9-9577-29dce56d8021.png></denchmark-link>
Environment:
Kubeflow version: (version number can be found at the bottom left corner of the Kubeflow dashboard): 1.15.2
kfctl version: 0.6.1
Kubernetes platform: minikube 1.3.1
Kubernetes version: kubectl version Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"15", GitVersion:"v1.15.2 Server Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"15", GitVersion:"v1.15.2
OS (e.g. from /etc/os-release): Ubuntu 18.04 - 64 bit

comments.comment: Issue-Label Bot is automatically applying the label kind/bug to this issue, with a confidence of 0.76. Please mark this comment with üëç or üëé to give our bot feedback! Links: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marketplace/issue-label-bot>app homepage</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://mlbot.net/data/kubeflow/kubeflow>dashboard</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hamelsmu/MLapp>code</denchmark-link> for this bot.
Can you please provide the commands you ran? Could you also try following the latest instructions for 0.6.

I believe the reason for this error is running kubeflow on the minikube with kubernetes versioned above 0.14 (ksonnet imcompatibility). What <denchmark-link:https://github.com/LinuxDevSecOps>@LinuxDevSecOps</denchmark-link> can do is to follow <denchmark-link:https://github.com/jlewi>@jlewi</denchmark-link> 's advise from this issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/issues/3610#issuecomment-511461426>#3610 (comment)</denchmark-link>

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/jlewi>@jlewi</denchmark-link> Yes here the commands: 804 sudo apt install virtualbox 805 sudo dpkg -i virtualbox-6.0_6.0.10-132072_Ubuntu_bionic_amd64.deb 806 cd Downloads/ 807 ls 808 sudo dpkg -i virtualbox-6.0_6.0.10-132072_Ubuntu_bionic_amd64.deb 809 cd ~ 810 sudo minikube start 811 sudo minikube dashboard --url 812 sudo curl -O <denchmark-link:https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/v0.2-branch/bootstrap/bootstrapper.yaml>https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/v0.2-branch/bootstrap/bootstrapper.yaml</denchmark-link>
813 sudo kubectl create -f bootstrapper.yaml 814 sudo kubectl get ns 815 sudo kubectl -n kubeflow get svc 816 sudo netstat -ltnp 817 POD= 818 sudo POD= 819 export KUBEFLOW_TAG=v0.4.1 820 sudo curl -O <denchmark-link:https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/$%7BKUBEFLOW_TAG%7D/scripts/setup-minikube.sh>https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/${KUBEFLOW_TAG}/scripts/setup-minikube.sh</denchmark-link>
821 sudo chmod +x setup-minikube.sh 822 sudo ./setup-minikube.sh 823 sudo minikube start 824 sudo ./setup-minikube.sh 825 SUDO kubectl -n kubeflow-admin get all 826 sudo kubectl -n kubeflow-admin get all 827 sudo kubectl -n kubeflow get pods 828 sudo kubectl get ns 829 sudo ubectl apply --validate=false -f default.yaml 830 sudo kubectl apply --validate=false -f default.yaml 831 cd Do 832 cd Downloads/ 833 ls 834 sudo tar -xvf kfctl__.tar.gz 835 sudo tar -xvf kfctl_v0.6.1_darwin.tar.gz 836 export PATH=$PATH:"" 837 export PATH=$PATH:"" 838 cd ~ 839 cd /opt/ 840 ls 841 cd ~ 842 sudo kfctl --platform=gcp --use_istio=true 843 sudo export CONFIG="<denchmark-link:https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/master/bootstrap/config/kfctl_k8s_istio.yaml>https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/master/bootstrap/config/kfctl_k8s_istio.yaml</denchmark-link> " 844 sudo kubectl -n kubeflow get pods 845 sudo minikube start 846 sudo minikube dashboard --url 847 sudo kubectl -n kubeflow get svc 848 sudo ./setup-minikube.sh 849 history 850 sudo minicube start 851 sudo minikube start 852 clear 853 sudo minikube start 854 sudo minikube dashboard --url

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/LinuxDevSecOps>@LinuxDevSecOps</denchmark-link> What instructions are you following? It looks like you are using really old versions
i.e. https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/v0.2-branch/bootstrap/bootstrapper.yaml is over a year old and no longer used And then later you are referencing version 0.4

I'm going to close this issue. There are updated instructions for installing Kubeflow on minikube here. <denchmark-link:https://www.kubeflow.org/docs/started/workstation/getting-started-linux/#minikube>https://www.kubeflow.org/docs/started/workstation/getting-started-linux/#minikube</denchmark-link>
Please try those and if you are still having problems open a new issue.
